text: Trying to defend that person is a hard job, I wouldn't recommend it. Some months ago she said <https://twitter.com/breeallegretti/status/1306603569903095809|https://twitter.com/breeallegretti/status/1306603569903095809> when everybody had been saying for weeks that the test and trace system was failing badly

text: I wonder if the question is not so much whether the virus would mutate, but whether the mutations would prove more problematic or hard to vaccinate for.  I.e. we need a different flu vaccine each fall, but some other vaccines have remained the same for many years
